def_en: If you describe something as lavish, you mean that it is very elaborate and impressive and a lot of money has been spent on it.

def_cn: （花费）挥霍的；（赞美等）慷慨给予的；（行为）毫无节制的
def_en: If you say that spending, praise, or the use of something is lavish, you mean that someone spends a lot or that something is praised or used a lot.
If you say that someone is lavish in the way they behave, you mean that they give, spend, or use a lot of something.

def_cn: 滥花；浪费；非常（或过分）慷慨地给予
def_en: If you lavish money, affection, or praise on someone or something, you spend a lot of money on them or give them a lot of affection or praise.
